page.title: 10STUDFALL INFANTS, CORBY.
page.content: When I visited my old school a 4th year girl was doing 3 weeks happy work experience there. Built in 1948, the school looks externally shabby, but inside is all colour, with beautiful decorations and lots of books in the corridors and little children are very happy and busy. They have lots of play equipment, sand and water, writing and painting thins and pictures everywhere. Little children learn the alphabet and how to count through play. Two classes went on an outing that day. The nursery has slides and paddling pools. When children are hungry they can have crisps and apples. A quiet room is for reading. Teachers were always ready to share children's problems. Photos of the teachers and helpers, even the caretaker, are pinned up so that children know who everyone is. Everyone is so friendly.
